channel.title: Venice on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Gus Van Sant to Receive Venice Fest’s Passion for Film Award
item.description: The two-time Oscar nominee will present his latest feature, ‘Dead Man’s Wire’ out of competition in Venice.

item.title: Gus Van Sant to Receive Venice Fest’s Passion for Film Award
item.description: The two-time Oscar nominee will present his latest feature, ‘Dead Man’s Wire’ out of competition in Venice.

item.title: Ukrainian, Iranian Docs, Kenyan Sci-Fi Set for Venice Days Lineup
item.description: Berlin festival winner Dag Johan Haugerud will head up the jury for this year’s Venice Days competition.

item.title: Ukrainian, Iranian Docs, Kenyan Sci-Fi Set for Venice Days Lineup
item.description: Berlin festival winner Dag Johan Haugerud will head up the jury for this year’s Venice Days competition.

item.title: 10 Colombian Directors to Watch
item.description: Narrowing Variety’s choice down to 10 was no small feat, given the surge of talent emerging from Colombia. Each year, more of its filmmakers win recognition at top-tier festivals, most recently
